    • Method Detail

      • requestPlayer

        Player requestPlayer(MetaPlayer metaPlayer,
                     PlayerSelector selector,
                     boolean forceChoice)
              throws UndoException
        Used when requesting Player.
        Parameters:
        metaPlayer - the color on the weapon/powerup.
        selector - the condition the returned player has to meet.
        forceChoice - condition to loop until valid input is received.
        Returns:
        a player that meets the condition of the selector
        Throws:
        UndoException

      • requestFragment

        java.lang.Integer requestFragment(int cardID,
                                  java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> fragments,
                                  boolean forceChoice)
                           throws UndoException
        Used when requesting which specif effect to used of a weapon.
        Parameters:
        cardID - weaponID
        fragments - list of the fragments ids
        forceChoice - boolean used to compel to choose, effectively looping until a valid input is received.
        Returns:
        int corresponding to the fragment chosen
        Throws:
        UndoException - to allow Undo

      • requestPayment

        PaymentReceipt requestPayment(PaymentInvoice invoice,
                              java.lang.Integer choice)
                       throws UndoException
        Used when requesting payment.
        Parameters:
        invoice - to be payed.
        choice - if the payment is for a weapon it's the fragment to be payed, defaults to -1 otherwise.
        Returns:
        the Payment Receipt
        Throws:
        UndoException
